value: Enemies are less accurate when targeting Nyx.
Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.
With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.
Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets. Hits strip some enemy defenses.
Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause. Targets then fired upon by Nyx receive a damage multiplier.
Enemies are less accurate when targeting Nyx.
Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.
With a powerful psychic blast, Nyx causes mass hysteria on the battlefield by confusing all enemies to attack random factions.
Nyx launches a cluster of force bolts at enemies, using telekinesis to adjust flight paths and seek nearby targets. Hits strip some enemy defenses.
Nyx invades the psyche of a target, confusing enemies and making them fight for the Tenno cause. Targets then fired upon by Nyx receive a damage multiplier.
When knocked-over, emit a defensive burst that topples attacking enemies.
Primes all enemies in a radius with anti-matter.
Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.
Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision.
Creates anti-matter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets.
When knocked-over, emit a defensive burst that topples attacking enemies.
Primes all enemies in a radius with anti-matter.
Creates a wormhole allowing instantaneous travel.
Launches a contained particle of antimatter that will detonate upon collision.
Creates anti-matter particles that orbit Nova and seek nearby targets.
If Nidus is killed with at least 15 stacks of Mutation, those 15 stacks are consumed; this grants 5 seconds of invulnerability and restores health to 50%.
Gluttonous maggots swarm nearby enemies, feasting until they burst with Infestation. The maggots benefit from Mutation and each enemy consumed adds to the Mutation stack.
Bind to a target with a parasitic link. For allies, both the host and Nidus gain increased Ability Strength. Linked enemies take the damage inflicted on Nidus.
Spawn an Infested pod that erupts with tendrils, latches onto nearby enemies and pulls them in.
Rupture the ground with a damaging fungal growth that steals energy from each enemy it strikes. For every five enemies hit, the Infestation mutates, multiplying its destructive force.
Slide faster and go farther.
Impale nearby enemies on spears that erupt from the below. Activate again to slam surviving enemies back into the ground.
Create a protective ring of fire, that also stuns and damage enemies who get too close.

Hurl a flaming ring that sets enemies ablaze making them vulnerable to any damage. Flaming enemies drop Restorative Orbs on death. Charge to amplify the power of the ring, and reactivate to instantly travel to the ring's location.
Blaze a trail of flames, scorching enemies and cleansing allies. Teleporting blasts the landing area with a ring of fire.
Restore a small amount of health with every nearby enemy death.
Summons shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period of time.
Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.
Casts fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.
A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.
Restore a small amount of health with every nearby enemy death.
Summons shadow versions of vanquished enemies to fight alongside you for a short period of time.
Forces fallen enemies around you to drop additional loot.
Casts fear into the hearts of nearby enemies, causing them to run away in terror.
A blow so powerful, it turns the enemy's very soul into a deadly projectile, damaging all in its path.
Long-lasting slide and faster acrobatic maneuvers.
Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.
Standing in light, Mirage deals heavy damage, while the shadows make Mirage difficult to track and even harder to hurt.

Booby trap nearby objects while conjuring an irresistible jewel that bursts with radial blind when touched in darkness, or a radial explosion in light. Conjure multiple smaller jewels with the help of Hall of Mirrors.
Mirage creates an entourage of doppelgangers to confuse and distract the enemy.
Long-lasting slide and faster acrobatic maneuvers.
Fires an energy prism that shoots lasers in all directions. Activating again detonates the prism, blinding nearby foes.
Standing in light, Mirage deals heavy damage, while the shadows make Mirage difficult to track and even harder to hurt.

Booby trap nearby objects while conjuring an irresistible jewel that bursts with radial blind when touched in darkness, or a radial explosion in light. Conjure multiple smaller jewels with the help of Hall of Mirrors.
Mirage creates an entourage of doppelgangers to confuse and distract the enemy.
Shoot dual-wielded sidearms faster and reload single-handed sidearms more rapidly. Gain bonus health when not using Melee Weapons.
With intense focus, Mesa draws her Regulator pistols, shooting down her foes in rapid succession.
Envelops Mesa in a barrier of energy, reflecting back incoming bullet damage.
Gives an ally extra damage while jamming the guns of nearby enemies. This power shifts between team members.
When activated, this power stores damage caused by guns. When triggered again, that damage is channeled through the next gunshot.
Shoot dual-wielded sidearms faster and reload single-handed sidearms more rapidly. Gain bonus health when not using Melee Weapons.
With intense focus, Mesa draws her Regulator pistols, shooting down her foes in rapid succession.
Envelops Mesa in a barrier of energy, reflecting back incoming bullet damage.
Gives an ally extra damage while jamming the guns of nearby enemies. This power shifts between team members.
When activated, this power stores damage caused by guns. When triggered again, that damage is channeled through the next gunshot.
Bullet jumping pulls-in nearby items for easy collection.
Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.
Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.
Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.
Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.
Bullet jumping pulls-in nearby items for easy collection.
Magnetizes the bones of nearby enemies, causing them to collapse upon themselves.
Emit an energy pulse that depletes enemy shields and armor, creating shards which become deadly when mixed with Magnetize. Shields of allies touched by the pulse are restored.
Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.
Magnetic force pulls enemies toward you, stunning them and bringing them into melee range.
Able to hang from walls for extended durations of time.
Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.
Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.
Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.
Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.
Able to hang from walls for extended durations of time.
Lets forth a wave of energy, disrupting the projectile weapons of enemies in range and forcing them to revert to melee combat.
Loki instantaneously swaps positions with a target, confusing the enemy.
Loki camouflages himself, becoming invisible to enemies.
Loki deploys a holographic copy of himself, drawing enemy fire.
Dodge to enter and exit the Rift. Entering leaves behind a small Rift portal. Energy slowly recharges in the Rift, and each enemy killed in there also gives energy.
A violent blast of void energy tears open a pocket of rift plane which can sustain itself for a short period before collapsing in another lethal blast.
Surges nearby Rift-bound enemies with Rift energy. When killed the Rift Surge is transferred to a nearby enemy outside the rift. Surged enemies that leave the Rift perform a radial Banish.
Freezes Rift-bound enemies. While active, enemy projectiles are arrested in mid-air, resuming its trajectory when stasis ends.
Casts a wave of Rift energy that damages hostiles while pushing enemies and allies out of Limbo’s current plane of existence.
Dodge to enter and exit the Rift. Entering leaves behind a small Rift portal. Energy slowly recharges in the Rift, and each enemy killed in there also gives energy.
A violent blast of void energy tears open a pocket of rift plane which can sustain itself for a short period before collapsing in another lethal blast.
Surges nearby Rift-bound enemies with Rift energy. When killed the Rift Surge is transferred to a nearby enemy outside the rift. Surged enemies that leave the Rift perform a radial Banish.
Freezes Rift-bound enemies. While active, enemy projectiles are arrested in mid-air, resuming its trajectory when stasis ends.
Casts a wave of Rift energy that damages hostiles while pushing enemies and allies out of Limbo’s current plane of existence.
The ferocious kavat, Venari, fights by Khora's side and provides her with a speed boost while active. If killed, Venari will reappear after a short time.

Weave a dome of living chain that ensnares and strangles any enemy within, and any foolish enough to approach. Foes outside the trap will try to hasten their comrade's deaths by shooting them. Crack Whipclaw on the dome to further damage any trapped enemies.
Command Venari to focus on a target. Hold to cycle between Attack, Protect, and Heal postures. If Venari is killed, use this ability to revive her instantly.
Bind a hapless target in living metal, entangling others who stray too close. Whipclaw will refresh the trap allowing it to capture more enemies.
Send enemies reeling with a deafening whipcrack.
Senses nearby enemies.
Summon a mighty bow and unleash a volley of devastating arrows.
Become invisible and steal loot from unsuspecting enemies or take out prey with deadly headshots.
Assume control of a projectile and guide it to the target.
Cycle through and shoot one of four tactical arrows: Cloak, Dashwire, Noise and Sleep. In the Conclave, use the Null-Shield and Slow Arrows.
While bleeding-out, Inaros becomes entombed in a protective Sarcophagus. He can revive himself by draining the life-force from nearby enemies and allies.
Charge to transform health into hardened scarab armor. Discharge to blast enemies with a scarab swarm; survivors have their health drained and bestowed on allies.
Become a whirling spiral of sand that sends enemies flying and devours those trapped in quicksand.
Hold power to trap target in quicksand and draw them in for devouring; this steals health and ultimately creates a friendly Sand Shadow.
Blast enemies with a wave of cursed sand that blinds them and steals their health.
Slam attacks have a chance to summon a tentacle.
Tap to spawn watery tentacles from all nearby surfaces to wreak havoc. Charge to increase the number of tentacles and spawn area. Use while in Undertow to have the tentacles emerge from the pool.
Become a water trap and drown unsuspecting enemies.
Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water.
Target an area and call down a barrage of liquid fury. Charge this attack to increase the lethality of the onslaught.
Slam attacks have a chance to summon a tentacle.
Tap to spawn watery tentacles from all nearby surfaces to wreak havoc. Charge to increase the number of tentacles and spawn area. Use while in Undertow to have the tentacles emerge from the pool.
Become a water trap and drown unsuspecting enemies.
Crash through enemies in a ferocious wall of water.
Target an area and call down a barrage of liquid fury. Charge this attack to increase the lethality of the onslaught.
Overshield cap doubled.
Protect nearby allies with an energy force that absorbs all damage and converts it to a Critical Chance bonus for all those under the Covenant. Headshots are amplified even further.

Channel Harrow’s energy into the Thurible to generate a buff. Once finished, kill enemies to bestow nearby allies with bursts of energy. The more energy channeled the greater the reward for each kill. Headshots produce extra energy.
Sacrifice shields to boost reload, and fire rate while converting damage inflicted on enemies into health for Harrow and nearby allies.
Cast a wave of energy that chains them where they stand. Each enemy held reinforces Harrow’s shields.
As Garuda nears death, her damage increases. Slashes with her talons if no melee weapon equipped.
Charge to expand the targeting area, release to send Garuda’s talons careening toward each target in area. Surviving enemies are prone to bleeding.
Garuda sacrifices her health to generate energy.
Impale an enemy on an altar of talons and siphon health for Garuda and her allies.
Rip the life force from an enemy and use it as a shield that captures damage. Charge to channel the captured damage into an explosive projectile.
A chance to create a radial blind when exposed to bright light.

Create an expanding ring of molten glass that slowly crystallizes enemies who enter. When the expansion is complete, the ring hardens to block weapons fire. The ring draws extra strength from the health and shields of crystallized enemies. Use Shattered Lash to smash the ring and send razor-sharp glass flying outward.
Trap enemies in a carousel of mirrors, forcing them to attack visions of their true selves. Destroyed mirrors damage their attackers, as does the collapse of the carousel.
Gara's armor splinters into a maelstrom of shattered glass that slices enemies and impairs their weapons. Allies who contact the cloud are fortified against damage.
Lash out with stream of shattered glass, or hold for an arcing strike.
Striking Frost with a melee attack may freeze the attacker.
Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.
Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.
Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystallized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.
A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.
Striking Frost with a melee attack may freeze the attacker.
Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.
Frost deep freezes any vapor and moisture in the area, creating a protective sphere with brief invulnerability to boost its strength.
Sends a wave of razor sharp, crystallized ice toward an enemy, dealing heavy damage.
A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.
Excalibur deals increased damage and attacks faster when wielding swords.
Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.
Launches javelins towards enemies, dealing high damage and impaling them to walls.
Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.
Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.
Excalibur deals increased damage and attacks faster when wielding swords.

Emits a bright flash of light, blinding all enemies in a small radius for several seconds.
Dash between enemies while slashing with the Exalted Blade.
Health Orbs generate a little Energy, while Energy Orbs restore a bit of Health.
In Night Form, allies are healed with each nearby enemy killed. In Day Form, nearby enemies are bled and then subjected to a wave of slashing force.
In Night Form reduces damage inflicted by nearby enemies. In Day Form increases Ability Strength of nearby allies.
In Night Form targets are put to sleep. In Day Form targets become more vulnerable to damage.
Switch forms, temporarily gaining bonus shields and armor in Night-Form, or bonus damage and speed in Day-Form.
Regenerates Energy and deals more damage while on Fire.
Blast nearby foes with a burst of fire, and follow that up with a barrage of fireballs against any enemy who dares approach. Over time, these fireballs burn hotter as they consume more energy.
Slam the ground to create a wave of plasma that incinerates nearby enemies and forms a persistent ring of fire. Add heat damage to weapons by firing them through the ring.
Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.
Charge and release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact and leaves behind a treacherous patch of flame.
Regenerates Energy and deals more damage while on Fire.
Blast nearby foes with a burst of fire, and follow that up with a barrage of fireballs against any enemy who dares approach. Over time, these fireballs burn hotter as they consume more energy.
Slam the ground to create a wave of plasma that incinerates nearby enemies and forms a persistent ring of fire. Add heat damage to weapons by firing them through the ring.
Stun nearby enemies with strong accelerant. Increases all fire damage dealt.
Charge and release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact and leaves behind a treacherous patch of flame.
Chosen Energy color dictates the type of elemental damage dealt by abilities.
Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.
When shields are hit, Chroma's armor grows stronger, when health takes a hit, weapon damage increases. Active for a limited time, maximum increases corresponding to rank.
Depending on Chroma's elemental alignment, an offensive area-of-effect is created. Chroma and his nearby allies are imbued with defensive energy.
Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction. Chroma's energy color determines the element.
Chosen Energy color dictates the type of elemental damage dealt by abilities.
Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.
When shields are hit, Chroma's armor grows stronger, when health takes a hit, weapon damage increases. Active for a limited time, maximum increases corresponding to rank.
Depending on Chroma's elemental alignment, an offensive area-of-effect is created. Chroma and his nearby allies are imbued with defensive energy.
Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction. Chroma's energy color determines the element.
Each projectile dodged, each enemy lulled or disarmed, erodes Baruuk's restrain and fuels the storm within. As baruuk's restraint is diminished he becomes more resistant to damage.
With his Restraint eroded, Baruuk commands the Desert Wind to deliver powerful radial strikes with his fists and feet. Each moment commanding the storm restores his Restraint.
Summon a bevy of orbiting daggers to seek out enemy guns, destroying them with a small explosion. Combine with Elude to double the range.

A calming wave slows enemies until they fall into a slumber. Enemies woken by damage will be confused and disoriented. Short-term amnesia means all waking enemies forget anything that happened before the lull.
Dodge all incoming projectiles, but only while not attacking. Use again to deactivate this ability.
Becomes inmune to Knockdown effects while on the ground.
Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee. Summoning petrifies enemies in close proximity to Atlas. When finished, Rumblers collapse into a pile of healing Rubble.
Atlas' hardened gaze will fossilize foes, heal Rumblers, and create Petrified Bulwarks. When shattered, petrified enemies drop healing Rubble for Atlas.
Summon a rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing towards the enemy.
Bash enemies with an exploding sliding punch, and repeat for a devastating combo. Petrified enemies take extra damage, and drop Rubble when destroyed. Rubble can heal Atlas and bol
Weapon noises are hushed so that enemies cannot hear them.
Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.
Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.
Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.
Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.

Bleed effects inflicted on enemies do more damage and last longer.
Project fierce shadow clones of Ash upon groups of distant enemies. Join the fray using Teleport.
Ash teleports towards the target, bringing him into melee range and making enemies vulnerable to finishers.
Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.
Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.
Bleed effects inflicted on enemies do more damage and last longer.
